comments.comment: He's gaining his dad strength now

love how pewdiepie has become a truly fit and healthy role model as we’ve grown up. completely shattering the stereotype our parents always gave to people who played video games all day. 
thank you as always pewds
Felix's growth has been so public and open to scrutiny and yet he's still ended up one of the most grounded, responsible and mature content creators on the internet.
I genuinely love this era of your channel. It’s really inspiring and peaceful.
Watching PewDiePie going from horror games, to becoming a dad, and understanding philosophy in this way is breathtaking.
You keep getting bigger and bigger, not just the body, but brain too. Big brain, big muscles, you're a complete idol Pewds. So glad I've followed alongside you all these years!
I just got off work and was literally thinking “eh I don’t really wanna go to the gym rn” nvm  I’ll go, thanks Felix you’re truly an inspiration!!
im most impressed with the full range of motion youve learned which was lacking in your older workout videos, good job Felix, keep smashing it

He's now at the top of the pyramid on Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs, which is self actualization, finding purpose and reaching inner potential. He's well off, has a wife, and a kid. People rarely ever reach that tier in the pyramid.
bro is becoming a super gigachad

training like mishima for 7 days
-> day 7
-> holds a failed military coup, proclaims love of the empire, commits seppuku

Felix, you are one of my biggest inspirations, and i started working out because of you. I grew up watching you since the amnesia days, and it's so amazing to me seeing how far you've come and how much you've grown and changed. The things you talk about now I take to heart.
Bro is the definition of hardwork and a loving dad
I love this new style of video. It's such a treat that even while 'retired' Felix still drops some quality content every now and then.
This is why you are the greatest YouTuber, reviewing a book, teaching philosophy, comedy :)
5:30 felix's climbing has gotten better in such a short time, here after watching the magnus mitbø collab, hope for more from the two. both have such likeable personalities and work so well together
6:02 that has to be the cutest one, where Felix is struggling, but his Mini-Me is just chilling

Pewdiepie has become such a good role model for young men, in an age where a lot of Youtubers claim to be the ideal role model for young men. Pewdiepie shines above them because he actually doesn't talk about it and clearly practices these great traits that all men should have. He should do more videos like this
This just became one of my favorite PewDiePie videos ever, love this side of Felix
It's so humbling to watch these types of Felix's videos of him just expressing himself and his thoughts
Me and a friend was just talking about your book reviews the other day and how we missed them so much, the book review/philosophy videos slaps so hard. This was a blessing! Thank you <3
when i was a kid and saw my da working out it built a love for hard work in me, i believe this will also benefit bjorn in his core memory, and youre gonna be able to curl bjorn, thats a canon event
My man is on his Greek God path. Jokes aside, it is really inspiring to see how important physical activity is to you in this era of your life. Keep it up man.

Man I feel like he’s really found himself again. I stopped watching when he started to put on a facade and didn’t enjoy his content anymore. Coming back and seeing how he loves his son, wife and most importantly values himself more than ever just makes me so happy because he makes other people so happy. I’m so glad these vlog type videos and health content exist on your page now. It seems like he’s found himself again and I couldn’t be prouder.

I grew up watching you since 2012 man, and God damn I’m so happy to see what you have become! You inspire us all to be our best selves. Thank you so much for everything you do :) I also had a child of my own around the same time as you. They are everything. Your son will know how great his daddy was and always will be.  Keep it up Felix ️

wow what a great line 
"why the intense desire to rise or achieve more (ascension) often appears almost crazy or irrational (madness)" 
this made my day

Please for a part two. Pewds, your speech have helped me overcome the troubles I currently have in relationships, work and well being. Everytime whenever I go to the gym or feeling down, I will listen to this. Please make more videos like this, its very good

Man, it's been beautiful seeing Felix evolve since I was a kid. He's become such a wholesome role model.

My little bro is quite heavily on the Autism spectrum - homeschooled, very late verbal development. He struggles greatly with social interaction, mostly retreating to the safety of gaming as a way of escape/numbing from the elevated stress levels he has to deal with and puberty, which alone is enough of a head-fuck to deal with.

Most people feel those anxieties to some degree, I struggle with many of the same battles, just to a lesser extent.

He's watched Pewds for a while, but Felix's recent videos have inspired him to start learning the Ukulele and beginning to draw, among other things.


It's helping him develop super meaningful hobbies and positive ways to spend his time that aren't focused on gaming, and it's helping him relate to people in a whole new way. It's really beautiful to see.

I hope he can stick to these new hobbies/interests over the years, as they'll deepen the quality of his life immensely. 

So, thank you sincerely, Felix. It's rare to see someone earnestly and humbly using their platform to constantly spread such a positive message. It's sadly rare in the absolute clutter fuck that is the modern age.
1:26 aliens casually checking in on the new pewdiepie update.
One of his best videos by far. So honest and reflective, so mature from where he started to where he is now. Would more videos like this, taking us through is workout and mind.
三島由紀夫は、大好きなので嬉しいです。実は、この本、私知りませんでしたので、早速図書館に予約入れました。日本人でも難解とおもわれる三島の本ですが、翻訳された本なのにちゃんと伝わってるのかな～とも思ったりしますが、三島を理解し、尊敬し、実践されてるPewDiePieさんを、尊敬します！PewDiePieさん、痩せてるのかと思ってましたが、マッチョでしたね！
Love that calm, vulnerable yet grounded Pewds. Love the funny times, but keen to see more of that collected wisdom approach

ピューディパイマジで三島大好きすぎてワロタ
三島のすごいところは元々超病弱の虚弱体質からあそこまで体を仕上げたところだよな
マジで尊敬できる
Felix actually has such a cool character arch. Love seeing people grow and evolve. We're all growing up together.

三島由紀夫知ってるってすごくない！？

Ngl pewdiepie, I may have been seeing your videos for over a decade now, but I can honestly say this type of content you made is the best video I seen you made. I appreciate your self improvement and ability to push more than the body, I love this so much.

"Creating a beautifull work of art and becoming beautifull oneself are identical" will forever be my favourite line mishima has granted the world, thank you for sharing your likeminded interest in his work

You’re a huge inspiration for me and I want you to know that even though probably a large portion of your fan base has been there from the beginning and grew up with you, you are helping the younger generation who wasn’t there for all of it. All the best to you and your family.
Pewds. From a 12 year old boy to a now 22 year old young man. This is inspirational. You taking the right steps especially after becoming a father. Bjorn is a lucky child to have you & marzia.

"It's alluring. Wanting to reach higher when you look up at the blue sky". Damn, that sounds like something straight out of the book.
3:40 Pewds abs is so shredded gaddeym bro!

Felix, I know you will probably not see this but seeing such a huge transformation from where you were 7-8 years ago to where you are now is truly inspiring. Life right now is not easy for me, but your journey is inspiring, I want to hit the gym, get into reading, start talking to more people in general and mature. I'm 24 right now, but sometimes I feel like a man child, I and many other young men need to start maturing so we just don't get stuck in video games, social media and all these other distracting factors that make us numb and make us escape reality. Sorry if I'm ranting right now, alas what I want to say is that I'll start my journey to find who I am and seeing that you have become such a cool man, it just makes me hopeful I can too. 
Greetings from Colombia!

I feel like a proud dad idk why 
Watching this man grow from being a guy who debated abt floor gang and high spec gaming chair to a man whos a dad , fit , intelligent and wise is just astonishing

Yukio Mishima is about as controversial as traditionalists get, but I have to say he is an incredibly engaging and interesting writer. I focused my early literary studies on his work in college since I was a transplanted from Japan at the time, and for all the questionable ideals he had in life I deeply enjoyed his works and appreciated the way he was able to paint visuals so easily with words. He really saw the beauty in Japan’s culture and people before and during the war.

I don’t agree with his opinions mind, but I do also understand why he felt the way he did about postwar Japan. It’s a complex and difficult topic to discuss that’s far more nuanced than pure ethnocentrism. The incredible series “Terror in Resonance” by Shinichiro Watanabe (Cowboy Bebop fame) touches on the topic in a very tasteful but provocative way, highly recommended it.
Wow. I loved this. Like reviewing a book while applying it to your everyday life. So cool
